item.description:
Hi All!

My old coach from TNT, Katherine Schwab, has confirmed her interest in running some open water swim clinics for the group. They would run for 45 min. and would cost $15.00 + $1.00 meetup.com charge for each person - so $16.00 total.

She is a certified Total Immersion swim coach and without her help I would have never gotten through my first tri. (I was a total noob to swimming). The clinic will cover things such as swim technique, sighting, turning and swimming in a group.

Date / Time: July 12th at 7:30 AM at Walden pond. Please arrive by 7:15AM to fill out waiver.
Meeting Place: The group will meet in front of the beach house of Walden pond across from the visitors center, where there is parking (for a fee).
For more information on the park, parking and directions: http://www.mass.gov/d...

There is a minimum of 4 people and a max of 10. I'm going to have to say it's a first come first serve basis, and if the clinics fill up we'll have to somehow regulate that a person can only partake in one clinic so everyone gets their fair share. Also, Katherine has been having a problem with people not showing and I ask that if you confirm being there as a "YES" that you please attend.

Wetsuits are not required. At this time of year the water in Walden is warm enough that one is not necessary. A lot of people chose to wear them just because they help keep you more buoyant.

More about Katherine here:
1) http://www.munchkinmo...
2) http://www.bigdreamsf...
3) Katherine online resume includes a face shot so you can try to recognize her: http://www.bigdreamsf...

Hope this is well received!

Here's to happy confident open-water swimming!

~ Rebecca

p.s. I would appreciate it, if after the clinic you could please leave some feedback.
item.how_to_find_us: In Front of the Walden Pond Beach House
item.why: People interested in swimming technique and open water swim pointers.
item.name: Open Water Swim Clinic - Walden Pond
